answers.a: Antibody is bound to an enzyme, which catalyzes the reaction
answers.b: Substrates in the reaction is converted to a colored end-product
answers.c: Antigen or antibody can be detected quantitatively with extremely sensitivity.

questions.question: 2. The major disadvantage of Direct ELISA is:

answers.a: Cross-reactivity of secondary antibody is eliminated
answers.b: Cross-reactivity might occur with the secondary antibody, resulting in nonspecific signal
answers.c: Labeling primary antibodies for each specific ELISA system is time-consuming and expensive
answers.d: Only one antibody and fewer steps are used

questions.question: 3.Direct ELISA is used for the detection of:
4. Washing step can be performed with a physiologic buffer such as tris-buffered saline (TBS) or phosphate-buffered saline (PBS)
